msg: Add a bunch of calls to flush the log accumulator into the work queue.
Leave a comment about where we CANNOT flush the work items too early. When
we reach a point where state changes are atomic, then this touchy/careful
(merge_file): scatter a bunch of FLUSH macros throughout the method.
leave some comments about critical points to NOT flush.
(close_file): explain why a FLUSH cannot be performed at one point.
